sqls.sql: INSERT INTO wcc_lec_req (leccode, lecnumb, userid, req_stat, req_sdat, req_edat, is_grad, update_dt, update_id) VALUES (:leccode, :lecnumb, :userid, 'LE', :lec_sdate, :lec_edate, 'G', SYSDATE, :update_id)
INSERT INTO wce_fnl_grd (leccode, lecnumb, userid, tot_score, update_dt, update_id) VALUES (:leccode, :lecnumb, :userid, :tot_score, SYSDATE, :update_id)
